text:
What is the conditional probability of having good stock performance in a poor
economic environment?
A. 0.02.
B. 0.10.
C. 0.30.
What is the joint probability of having a good economy and a neutral stock
performance?
A. 0.09.
B. 0.20.
C. 0.30.
What is the total probability of having a good performance in the stock?
A. 0.35.
B. 0.65.
C. 1.00.
Given that the stock had good performance, the probability the state of the
economy was good is closest to:
A. 0.35.
B. 0.46.
C. 0.51.
